entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 2:44PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY PRECIPITATION POSSIBLE FOR WEDNESDAY THROUGH FRIDAY... A developing low in the Gulf of Alaska looks to bring potentially heavy precipitation to the area starting late Tuesday night into Wednesday morning and lasting through Friday morning. Warm, moisture laden air overrunning cold air in place across Southeast Alaska will result in accumulating snow for most of the panhandle.
